remarks: The image of a connected set is connected.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 7-Jul-2015.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 22-Aug-2015.)
statement:
conima.x $e |- X = U. J $.
conima.f $e |- ( ph -> F e. ( J Cn K ) ) $.
conima.a $e |- ( ph -> A C_ X ) $.
conima.c $e |- ( ph -> ( J |`t A ) e. Con ) $.
conima $p |- ( ph -> ( K |`t ( F " A ) ) e. Con ) $.
